articles.description: Aaron Judge hit his 62nd home run of the season Tuesday night, breaking Roger Maris's American League record and setting what some fans consider baseball's "clean" standard.
articles.content:
Aaron Judge took a smooth, mighty swing, then broke into a big smile as he trotted around the bases. Heading home, his teammates backed away, letting him touch the plate alone.

articles.title: Most Americans don't plan to get a flu shot this season — lots of them say they'll mask to avoid germs instead - CNBC
articles.description: A higher share of Americans plan to mask at least sometimes this flu season to avoid germs than plan to get vaccinated, according to a survey from the NFID.
articles.content: Only 49% of U.S. adults plan to get their flu shot this flu season, according to a survey conducted by the National Foundation for Infectious Diseases (NFID). Even 1 in 5 of those who are at higher r… [+3003 chars]
